name: Cheshire Cat, Guide to the Mysterious World
text:
This card gains Flying, First Strike, Swiftness, and/or Precision as long as there are cards with that ability in any removed area that were removed by this card.
This card gains [+100/+100] for each card in any removed area that was removed by this card.
0: Choose one. Play this ability only once per turn - Remove a card in your hand from the game; or put a card from a removed area that was removed by this card into your hand.
